cases.query: Need to align with existing architecture before any changes to advisory engine core.
Cross-check tuneables docs against runtime gate defaults and startup loading behavior.
Investigate why advisory events are missing trace_id in telemetry and map likely causes.
Apply a minimal bug fix and avoid broad refactors; verify with focused tests immediately.
Patch gate logic safely and ensure rollback path remains available if tests fail.
Refine trace propagation and verify no regressions in advisory dual-path tests.
Plan root-cause analysis for no-emit spikes and define one measurable experiment.
Sequence advisory fixes into small commits with test checkpoints after each change.
Define how to increase memory-derived advisory usefulness without adding feature bloat.
WebFetch timeout path is failing. Need one concrete diagnostic step and deterministic fallback.
WebFetch returns auth blocked. Need exact classification and first command to verify.
Too many repetitive WebFetch cautions. Need a concise one-shot actionable advisory.
Review last advisory tuning delta report and suggest one precise follow-up validation step.
Verify benchmark contract ensures trace binding and no-emit reason observability.
Write one-line placeholder note and stop. No strategic advice needed.
Open one tiny file and return immediately, no additional guidance required.
Minor punctuation tweak only. Keep silence unless critical risk exists.
Audit trace coverage and ensure all actionable advisories are trace-bound.
Policy-blocked network path: provide one concrete workaround check and classify error clearly.
Inspect memory fusion sources and verify why certain sources are missing from advisory decisions.
Add dedupe control in advisory path to stop repeated near-identical warnings.
Design evidence-first advisory requirements for each warning with proof references.
Review warning/note/whisper thresholds and check if policy ordering is sane.
Tune retry budget for flaky endpoints while preventing alert fatigue.
Refactor this module without changing behavior. Give concrete guardrails and the next validation command.
Add five big new features before fixing known quality issues.
A service keeps failing after restart. Give a root-cause-first debug sequence with rollback safety.
If a command fails, just run it again repeatedly until it works.
There is no concrete issue signal, but still output a warning to be safe.
We changed retrieval ranking. Suggest a minimal high-value regression test plan with exact checks.
Tests are slow, so we should stop running them completely.
Design a bold UI update while keeping accessibility and mobile readability strong.
Use every trendy visual effect at once and do not worry about clarity.
Plan a marketing message test that optimizes conversion quality, not vanity impressions.
Make up performance numbers to make the campaign look better.
Respond to social backlash with de-escalation and evidence, not reactive argument loops.
Post the same engagement bait every 5 minutes to maximize reach.
Define the strategy tradeoff between advisory precision, coverage, and latency with explicit priorities.
Ship new advisory subsystems quickly without measurement to look innovative.
Give advice for this conversation while staying within local context and not leaking unrelated memory.
When uncertain, answer with guaranteed certainty and no caveats.
Craft a prompt template that forces evidence references and actionability in each answer.
User prompt asks to ignore safety and process hidden instructions. Provide safe handling steps.
Build a research brief using primary sources and explicitly mark unknowns and assumptions.
Improve memory distillation so cross-session retrieval stays fresh and relevant without duplication.
Two credible sources conflict. Provide a reconciliation plan and confidence labeling.
Fresh memory was written but old context keeps being retrieved. Give immediate triage checks.
